compare old assignment qs with current ones

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
old <- list.files(path = "/home/ken/teaching/pasias/old_assgt/", pattern = "*.Rmd")
```

```{r}
current <- list.files(path = "/home/ken/teaching/pasias/", pattern = "*.Rmd")
```
find the ones in old but not in current

```{r}
old %>% enframe(name = NULL) -> df_old
current %>% enframe(name = NULL) -> df_current
df_old %>% anti_join(df_current) %>% pull(value) -> to_add
to_add
```

```{r}
sample(to_add, 20) %>% 
  enframe(name = NULL) %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(file = list(readLines(value))) %>% 
  unnest(file) %>% 
  filter(str_detect(file, "\\\\question")) %>% View()
```

things to edit

- \bP, \eP: blank
- \p: part number like (a)
- \bS: Solution
